div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: title: Recommended Action for Population: Adult Surgical Patients Pre- or Intraoperatively, do not suggest using any single specific biomarker to identify patients at risk of POD

description: Recommended Action for Adult Surgical Patients Pre- or Intraoperatively, do not suggest using any single specific biomarker to identify patients at risk of postoperative delirium (POD) and show recommendation 3.4.
code: We do not suggest using any single specific biomarker to identify patients at risk of POD. ()
